column4: ɔbɛtsena sum kebii mu."

column3: mesi dan ayɛ tsenabew ama wo
column4: na beebi a ebɛtsena hɔ daa."

column3: na ohyiraa Israel mboanofo nyinara: na Israel mboanofo no nyinara gyinagyinaa tsentsen."

column4: Israel Nyankopɔn a ɔdze n’ano kyerɛɛ m’egya David
column5: na ɔdze ne nsa ahyɛ no ma

column2: "Ofitsi da a medze me man mifi Egypt asaase do mebae no
column3: mannsan mu ennyi kurow bi emmfi Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw nyinara mu dɛ wonsi mu dan
column4: ma me dzin ntsena hɔ; nkyii so mannsan mu ennyi nyimpa biara dɛ ondzi panyin wɔ me man Israel do:"

column3: dɛ me dzin ntsena hɔ; na masan mu eyi David dɛ ɔnhwɛ me man Israel do."

column2: "Afei ɔwɔ m’egya David n’akoma mu dɛ nkyɛ obesi dan ama EWURADZE
column4: ne dzin."

column3: Susuampa dɛ ɔwɔ w’akoma mu dɛ nkyɛ ibesi dan ama me dzin no
column4: ayɛ no yie dɛ ɔwɔ w’akoma mu:"

column3: na mbom wo ba a ofi w’asen mu bɛba no
column4: ɔno na obesi dan no ama me dzin."

column2: "Na EWURADZE ama n’asɛm a ɔkae no ahyɛ ma; na masoɛr mahyɛ m’egya David n’ananmu
column4: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE bɔɔ anohoba no
column5: na mesi dan no ama EWURADZE

column2: "Na hɔ na medze adaka no a EWURADZE n’ahyɛmu a ɔnye Israelmba dzii no wɔ mu no esi."
"Na ogyinaa EWURADZE n’afɔrmbukyia no enyim wɔ Israel mboanofo no nyinara enyim
"(osiandɛ Solomon ayɛ boran sumpii bi a ne tsentsen yɛ basafa ebien na fa
column3: na ne tɛtɛr basafa ebien na fa
column4: na no krɔn basafa kor na fa
column5: na ɔdze esi abangua no ne finimfin; na ɔno do na okegyinae
column6: na ɔkotoow n’anankoroma enyim wɔ Israel mboanofo no nyinara enyim
column7: na ɔtrɛɛ ne nsamu wɔ sor:)"

column4: Onyankopɔn bi nnyi hɔ a ɔtse dɛ ɔwo
column5: wɔ sor
column6: anaa asaase do a isie ahyɛmu na mbɔbɔrhu ma wo nkowaa a wɔdze hɔn akoma nyinara nantsew w’enyim:"

column2: "ɔwo a esie dza edze bɔɔ w’akowaa m’egya David anohoba no ama no: nyew
column4: na edze wo nsa ahyɛ no ma
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi."

column4: Israel Nyankopɔn
column5: sie dza edze abɔ anohoba ama w’akowaa m’egya David no ma no
column7: Nyimpa a ɔbɛtsena Israel ahengua do rommbɔ wo wɔ m’enyim; sɛ wo mba hwɛ hɔn kwan yie
column8: dɛ wɔbɛnantsew wɔ me mbra mu dɛ mbrɛ ɔwo anantsew wɔ m’enyim yi ara a."

column4: Israel Nyankopɔn
column5: ma w’asɛm a ekaa kyerɛɛ w’akowaa David no ntsim."

column2: "Ma aso ampa dɛ Nyankopɔn bɛtsena nyimpa nkyɛn wɔ asaase do a? Hwɛ
column3: ɔsor na ɔsor no sorsor mpo nntum nnkora wo; na ankantam ɔdan yi a mesi yi!"

column4: na no ntotɔserɛ bi
column5: dɛ ibetsie w’akowaa ne nkekamu na ne mpaabɔ a ɔrobɔ no w’enyim yi:"

column2: "dɛ w’enyi bobue wɔ ɔdan yi do adzekyee na adzesaa
column3: mekyerɛ bea a ɔwoara ase dɛ edze wo dzin bɛtsena hɔ no do; dɛ ibetsie mpaabɔ a w’akowaa bɔbɔ akyerɛ bea yi do no."

column2: "Na tsie w’akowaa na wo man Israel ntotɔserɛ
column3: aber a wɔrobɔ mpaa kyerɛ bea yi do; nyew
column4: tsie no wɔ wo tsenabea hɔ
column5: mekyerɛ ɔsor a; na sɛ etse a

column2: "Sɛ nyimpa bi yɛ bɔn tsia ne nyɛnko
column3: na ntam bi bɛda no do dɛ ɔka
column4: na ɔba bɛka ntam wɔ w’afɔrmbukyia enyim wɔ ofi yi mu a:"
na bu wo nkowaa atsɛn
column5: dɛ erehyɛ ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi no ananmu
column6: ma no kwan eebua nankasa n’etsifi; na irubu ɔtseneneenyi no bem
column7: ma aama no dɛ mbrɛ ne ndzeyɛtsenenee tse."

column2: "Na sɛ wɔka wo man Israel gu wɔ atamfo enyim
column3: osiandɛ wɔayɛ bɔn etsia wo ntsi; na wɔsan ba bio bɔbɔ wo dzin
column4: na wɔbɔ mpaa na wɔtotɔ serɛ wɔ w’enyim wɔ ofi yi mu a:"

column3: na fa wo man Israel hɔn bɔn kyɛ
column4: na fa hɔn bra asaase a ɔwoara dze maa hɔn na hɔn egyanom no do bio."
osiandɛ wɔayɛ bɔn etsia wo ntsi; na sɛ wɔbɔ mpaa kyerɛ bea yi do
column5: na wɔbɔ wo dzin
column6: na wɔsan fi hɔn bɔn ho

column3: na fa wo nkowaa na wo man Israel hɔn bɔn kyɛ hɔn
column4: dɛ erekyerɛ hɔn ɔkwan pa a ɔsɛ dɛ wɔfa do; na ma nyankom ntɔ ngu w’asaase a ɔwoara dze ama wo man dɛ egyapadze no do."
sɛ ehuw anaa ɔpo
column5: mbɛbɛw anaa nkonyinko ba; sɛ hɔn atamfo botua hɔn wɔ hɔn nkuropon asaase do; owuyar biara anaa yarba biara ba a;"

column2: "mpaabɔ na ntotɔserɛ biara a nyimpa biara
column3: anaa wo man Israel nyinara bɛyɛ a nyimpa biara bohu nankasa no wuyar na nankasa ne yaw
column4: na ɔbɛtrɛ ne nsamu akyerɛ ofi yi do no:"

column2: "ɔno ɔwoara tsie wɔ ɔsor wo tsenabea hɔ
column4: na ma nyimpa biara dɛ mbrɛ n’akwan nyinara tse
column5: nyia ɔwoara inyim n’akoma mu a; (osiandɛ ɔwo
column7: na inyim nyimpa mba hɔn akoma mu;)"

column4: mber tsentsen a wɔdze bɛtsena asaase a ɔwoara edze maa hɔn egyanom no do no."

column2: "Nkyii so ɔhɔho a ommfi wo man Israel mu ho dze
column4: na wo tum nsa
column5: na w’abasa a atsen mu no ntsi
column6: ma ofi ekyirekyir man bi mu ba; na sɛ wɔba bɔbɔ mpaa kyerɛ dan yi do a:"

column4: na yɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔhɔho no su frɛ wo no nyinara; ma asaase do aman nyinara eehu wo dzin
column5: na woeesuro wo
column6: dɛ mbrɛ wo man Israel yɛ
column7: na woeehu dɛ wo dzin na wɔdze frɛ ɔdan yi a mesi yi."

column2: "Sɛ wo man fir edzi nye hɔn atamfo kedzi ako
column3: wɔ ɔkwan biara a ɔwoara bɔsoma hɔn do
column4: na wɔbɔ wo mpaa kyerɛ kurow a asan mu eyi
column5: na dan a mesi ama wo dzin yi do a:"

column2: "ɔno ɔwoara tsie hɔn mpaabɔ na hɔn ntotɔserɛ wɔ sor
column3: na dzi hɔn asɛm ma hɔn."
(osiandɛ nyimpa bi nnyi hɔ a onnyi bɔn
column4: ) na wo bo fuw hɔn
column5: na iyi hɔn ma atamfo
column6: ma wɔfa hɔn ndɔmmum kɔ asaase bi do ekyirekyir o

column2: "naaso sɛ hɔnara wɔdwen wɔ asaase a wɔafa hɔn ndɔmmum akɔ do no do
column4: na wɔtotɔ serɛ wo wɔ hɔn ndɔmmum asaase no do
column5: dɛ

column2: "sɛ wɔdze hɔn akoma nyinara na hɔn kra nyinara san ba wo nkyɛn wɔ hɔn ndɔmmum asaase no do
column3: mbrɛ wɔafa hɔn ndɔmmum akɔ no
column4: na woyi mpaa kyerɛ hɔn asaase a ɔwoara edze maa hɔn egyanom
column5: na kurow a ɔwoara asan mu eyi
column6: na wɔkyerɛ ɔdan a mesi ama wo dzin yi do a:"

column2: "ɔno ɔwoara tsie hɔn mpaabɔ na hɔn ntotɔserɛ wɔ sor
column4: na dzi hɔn asɛm ma hɔn; na fa kyɛ wo man a wɔayɛ bɔn etsia wo no."
meserɛ wo
column5: bue w’enyiwa
column6: na kyɛn w’aso wɔ mpaabɔ a wɔbɔ wɔ ha yi do."

column4: soɛr kɔ w’ahomgyebea no mu
column5: ɔwo
column6: na w’ahoɔdzen adaka no: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn
column8: na ma w’ahotseweefo enyi ngye wɔ papa mu."

column3: mma nndan wo nyia asera no no enyi: kaa w’akowaa David adɔyɛ no."
